bill.title: MCO-DENIAL RATE-AUDIT
bill.abstract: Directs the Auditor General to conduct an audit of the average denial rate of hospitals throughout Illinois in both the fee-for-service and managed care programs, with at least 50% of the audit consisting of safety-net and critical access hospitals.

status.statusval: Filed with the Clerk by Rep. Justin Slaughter

bill.title: An Act relative to marijuana-related revenue in the town of Millbury
bill.abstract: Storm Water Improvements Stabilization Fund. If there is no allocation into the Road Infrastructure Stabilization Fund or an allocation of less than 50%, then the amount otherwise allocable to the Road Infrastructure Stabilization Fund is to be allocated, in equal amounts, to the Other Post-Employment Benefits Stabilization Fund, the Unfunded Retirement Liability Stabilization Fund and the Capital Projects Stabilization Fund.

bill.title: Local Coverage Determination Clarification Act of 2017
bill.abstract: ...This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the process by which Medicare administrative contractors (MACs) issue and reconsider local coverage determinations (LCDs) that: (1) are new,(2) restrict or substantively revise existing LCDs, or (3) are otherwise specified in regulation. (MACs are private insurers that process Medicare claims within specified geographic areas.)</p> <p>Beforesuch an LCDmay take effect, the MAC issuing the determination must, with respect to each geographic area to which the determination applies:</p> <ul> <li>publish online aproposed version of the determination and other specified, related information; </li> <li>convene one or more public meetings to review the draft determination, receive comments, and ...

status.statusval: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
